name: Hainan Airlines Old Livery Airbus A330-300 Arriving at Calgary Airport
description:
With the debut of the 787 into its fleet, Hainan Airlines introduced a new livery, with a red stripe waving from the tail down the majority of the fuselage. But there are a few aircraft still in this older livery, including this Airbus A330-300 seen here, B-5905. Hainan normally serves Calgary with their A330-200s, so having the -300 itself is a bit special. Enjoy this close up view of this Chinese A330-300!

Thanks for watching!
